channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bessent says U.S.-China trade truce is "working pretty well"
item.description: The Trump administration is "very happy" with the current China tariffs agreement, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Tuesday. Why it matters: Bess...

item.title: Here's what's standing in the way of Trump's Russia-Ukraine peace summit
item.description: The White House insists Vladimir Putin and Volodymyr Zelensky will soon meet for peace talks. The Kremlin seems far less certain. Why it matters: Puti...

item.title: Exclusive: Newsom pollster sees big support for California redistricting
item.description: Gov. Gavin Newsom 's bid to redraw California's congressional seats to create more Democrat-friendly districts has a 22-point advantage in support amo...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: 11 ways to influence Trump
item.description: There's a clear map for swaying President Trump — and it goes far beyond the cartoonish commentary that flattery and gifts are the surest ways. Why it...

item.title: Inflation grows increasingly likely as companies start to buckle under tariffs
item.description: The corporate pricing dam is cracking — companies are raising prices, or signaling that increases are coming, to absorb some of the costs of the Trump...

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Texas state House on cusp of passing election map favored by Trump
item.description: The Republican-controlled chamber will gavel back into session Wednesday with an intent to vote on a plan to help the GOP in the midterms.

item.title: Texas Capitol evacuated after shooting threat citing ‘political situation’
item.description: Protestors had gathered at the Capitol building to support state Rep. Nicole Collier (D), who slept on the House floor rather than agreeing to a polic...

item.title: Hegseth’s expansive security requirements tax Army protective unit
item.description: The agency tasked with protecting Defense Department leaders is under significant strain, and the secretary’s atypical needs are becoming untenable, o...

item.title: White House creates account on TikTok, the app Trump once tried to ban
item.description: The White House launched an account on popular video app TikTok despite the U.S.’s rocky history with the Chinese-owned company. Trump once called it ...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
